alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake and northwestern Orange Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paisley, moving east at 15 mph. Another strong storm just to the south was pushing east of Leesburg and will also have brief strong gusty winds. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora, and Howey-In-the-hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County
